channel.title: Posts on Khoi Pro
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Khoi Pro

item.title: Welcome
item.description: It’s my pleasure to open back my small blog, khoi.pro, and see you, a guest, comes and visit it! This blog isn’t too much noisy. I just share some notes from my work - experience when working with multiple platforms, from WordPress, Shopify CMS to Pantheon, Netlify or some JAMstack. Don’t ask me too many questions. My blog isn’t a good place to ask or answer, but to share only! I’m using Hugo to deploy it for a private purpose.
